title: Hour 1 - Kevin Durant, USC/UCLA, Rick Bucher
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Kevin Durant, USC/UCLA, Rick Bucher
description:
In Colin's return, he notes that there is nothing weird about Kevin Durant wanting to leave the Brooklyn Nets. USC and UCLA are on their ways out of the PAC-12 and heading to the BIG 10. Rick Bucher then joins the show to talk the possibility of Golden State re-acquiring Kevin Durant.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
